name: With my phone!
description:
Made for weekly game jam 83.
Inspired by a childhood tv game show "Hugo" where players where using their phones to provide inputs for a game running on their tv screens. Game is rather proof of concept then a full release, but it kinda is playable.

If someone feels offended by my usage of idea, than sorry :( I was ill for most of the week and could not jam properly :(
